channel.title: Turning round a toxic company culture. AMA with Art Papas, CEO of Bullhorn
channel.description:
Most people recognise that **company culture** is a key ingredient in making a company successful whether that company is bootstrapped, venture funded or public.
**What happens when your culture runs out of control?**
Art Papas, CEO and Founder of Bullhorn, a fast-growing, 600 person, SaaS business faced that very problem. The company he founded was increasingly celebrating GROWTH over customer satisfaction. Getting the company back on track took a huge effort.
**Join Art tomorrow ([Free and online, Tuesday 28th March, 17.00 BST](http://businessofsoftware.org/2017/02/ama-art-papas-bullhorn-28-march-2017-17-00-gmt/?utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=ArtPapasAMA&utm_source=BootstrappedFM)),** to discuss changing company culture and anything else you want to ask him.
